headline: Neogen (NEOG) Valuation in Focus as Lawsuits and Operational Setbacks Unsettle Investors
summary: Neogen (NEOG) is making headlines this week. If you’re holding shares or considering the stock, there is a lot to review. Multiple class action lawsuits have just landed, each claiming that Neogen and its leaders misled investors about the integration of 3M Company’s Food Safety Division and the operational challenges that followed. These suits come shortly after the company announced lower revenue, reduced its guidance, accepted the CEO’s resignation, and signaled that profit margins will be...
